attributes.action: Decrease days that schools are open for education from five to four
attributes.additional_details: The Government should do this as the amount of Covid-19 cases are increasing around the UK and this situation is getting worse by the minute as this will help to reduce the amount of infected people by limiting contact
attributes.background: Decrease days that schools are open for education from five to four to limit contact of school children to keep teachers, families and children safe from Covid-19

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551615
